text: Italians ( ) are a Romance ethnic group native to the Italian peninsula. Italians have a common culture, history, ancestry and language.Miti e simboli della rivoluzione nazionale . Treccani.itGiuliano Procacci (ed.) (2009) Storia degli Italiani (In Italian: History of the Italian People). Rome, Italy: Editori Laterza. == References == Category:Ethnic groups in Europe
title: Italians
